articles.author: Samuel Gibbs
articles.title: Say hello to longlife tech that can challenge our throwaway culture - The Guardian
articles.description: We’ve got used to dumping old devices. But a new breed of firms is making products that they hope you will hang on to
articles.content: It is a habit that has become ingrained in so many consumers that you could be forgiven for thinking there was no other way: dumping your old and tired tech for a shinier model every year or two, she… [+11790 chars]
